Reviews.Title: “Business Trip Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mbond132
Reviews.Content: stayed bastion hotel amsterdam amstel 5 nights business trip city hotel located outside city centre local shop nearby total garage door little isolated middle business park reasonably close amsterdam arena 10 minute walk nearest metro station taxi ride city centre central station cost 23 euros hotel fairly modern dutch hotels indoor smoking hard comprehend coming uk greeting reception professional luckily english 2nd floor actually 1st floor counted basement ground floor access upper floors via stairs lift accessed keycard access individual row keycard deluxe single consisted 2 single beds seating 2 comfortable armchairs table desk bathroom clean tidy shower excellent power negative carpet spilled stain cleaned nice quiet disturbed night doors closing hydraulic close hinges couldnt closed quietly breakfast pretty option cereals breads meats cheeses fruits yoghurts pastries scrambled fried boiled eggs bacon nice warm supposed warm fresh evening meal hotel hot tasty lot euro chicken tandoori waiting breads garlic butter followed salad meal salad chips wedges nice overall tidy hotel recommend visitors

Reviews.Title: “Great for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: Anna B
Reviews.Content: location 20 minutes hotel door centraal station metro ample free parking bed breakfast price city centre location fairly basic clean comfortable downside hairdriers bedrooms reception available

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel for the Price”
Reviews.Author: Karen D
Reviews.Content: hotel stay driving amsterdam secure free parking onsite free wifi throughout hotel located 10 minute easy walk metro 1150 euro 48 hour inclusive ticket metro tram bus ours smokefree strong smell cigarette smoke arrival breakfast buffet bit price 1350 euro front desk personnel nice helpful overly friendly definitely recommend plan drive amsterdam spend minimal time

Reviews.Content: stayed nights business hotel located 20 euros cab central amsterdam quiet soundproofing excellent despite hotel located tracks view inspiring bathrooms clean shower temperature bit quirky towels bathrobes clean changed everyday buffet breakfast nice selection restaurant bar pretty decent people warm clean quilts staff distant helpful maybe understaffed receptionist checking guests catering people bar simultaneously hotel pretty secure keycard entry lifts floors smokers beware smoking lounge ground floor opposite reception bit inconvenient six floors time smoke basic frills business hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, great location for exploring Amsterdam”

Reviews.Content: stayed weekend friends superb location ten mins walk metro 15min ride central station staff helpful friendly little busy understaffed clean functional definately recommend hotel visiting amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Spotless,Comfortable and Highly Recommended”

Reviews.Content: amsterdam unsure getting hotel bit outno worry directions 100 accurate metro quick cheap 72hr pass 1550 euros excellent value short walk hotel safe enviroment spotless bath bar safeand comfortablei read bad reviews hotelbut assure absolute buffet breakfast laid lots am visit amsterdam definately againjust add staff friendly stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable & spotlessly clean.”
Reviews.Author: MARYLOUESSEX
Reviews.Content: daughter looked loads hotel trip amsterdam chose bastion near amstel coach station travelling definitely choice deluxe twin nicely furnished kept spotlessly clean staff minus paper cups supplied teacoffee facilities friendly hot drink facility plus mini fridge breakfast plenty choice including bacon eggs fried scrambled boiled readily replenished item runs low nearest metro station centraal station centre town told day takes 10 mins visit cruise etc purchase amsterdam card free entry plus free unlimited travel buses metro saving lots money
